name: sonic lost dimension
description:
there is audio in this game

dejam submission

use the mouse to click and drag in order to move the floor and for other stuff u click on sonic to make him go

and click the enemy to launch it then u can drag to a position

hit r to exit the credit screen 

your goal is not to stop sonic but to delay him for as long as possible

ai is a little special  so u might have to restart or  change a block to help it out 

there is voice acting in this  

sega pls dont sue me   all right to the characters and enemy's  and songs belong to sega

 tros  is a oc and belongs  to  me and my team 

all the sprites are original and my work 

the voice of tros is  shubwub  https://www.twitch.tv/shubwub

 i am the programmer and artist   for this  game  

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC88mPt3knDtrqrcO4lMB3Dw

this is meant to be a fan game  for   dejam2 

https://itch.io/jam/de-jam-2

i will be doing a post  jam update

team
